comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Perhaps he was the "mascot," or maybe the water boy, of the Princeton University football team. He is shown here on the Princeton field -- probably at a practice session in November, 1913.

The fish-shaped gizmo suspended from a ribbon around his neck may be an ocarina.

A shot of the Harvard vs. Princeton football game on this field, November 7, 1913. The stands in the background are the same:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4464317381/]
